name: Blueprint Word
description:
A fascinating and tricky puzzle game that will make you use all your potential and put maximum effort into an easy, at first glance, task. All that prevents you on the way to victory is the number of moves. Count on each step, adjust to the situation and do not fall for deception.

  • Stylish and minimalistic design.
  • More than 100 unique levels.
  • Constant expansion of basic capabilities, as well as the addition of new ones.

Сontact: support@shardreal.com
